sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Pricing() { const [billingCycle, setBillingCycle] = useState('monthly'); const C = { sage: '#6B9E80', forest: '#2A5741', lavender: '#B4A7D6', lavenderPale: '#F3F1F9', lavenderMid: '#D8D3E8', beige: '#F0EAD9', white: '#FFFFFF', gray: '#6B7280', darkGray: '#1F2937', lightGray: '#F9FAFB', green: '#059669' }; const tiers = [ { name: "Bronze", badge: "ðŸ¥‰", price: { monthly: 0, annual: 0 }, clients: "5 clients/month", tagline: "Perfect for new therapists", features: [ "Visual body maps (front/back)", "Basic preferences tracking", "Session history (last 10 sessions)" ], cta: "Start Free", ctaLink: "/signup" }, { name: "Silver", badge: "ðŸ¥ˆ", price: { monthly: 24, annual: 19 }, clients: "Unlimited clients", tagline: "Perfect for established therapists", popular: true, features: [ "Everything in Bronze", "UNLIMITED client intakes", "AI Session Intelligence", "Full session history (unlimited)", "Client Loyalty Program", "Priority email support (24hr)" ], cta: "Start 14-Day Free Trial", ctaLink: "/signup?plan=silver" }, { name: "Gold", badge: "ðŸ¥‡", price: { monthly: 49, annual: 39 }, clients: "Up to 5 therapists", tagline: "Perfect for small practices", features: [ "Everything in Silver", "Up to 5 therapist accounts", "Shared client database", "Team dashboard", "Custom intake questions", "Priority support (12hr response)" ], cta: "Start 14-Day Free Trial", ctaLink: "/signup?plan=gold" } ]; return (
{/* Header */}
ðŸŒ¿ BodyMap
Home Features Why BodyMap Start Free Trial
{/* Hero */}

Simple, Transparent Pricing

Start free. Upgrade anytime. Cancel anytime.

{/* Billing Toggle */}
{/* Pricing Tiers */}
{tiers.map((tier) => { const price = billingCycle === 'monthly' ? tier.price.monthly : tier.price.annual; return (
{ e.currentTarget.style.transform = 'translateY(-4px)'; e.currentTarget.style.boxShadow = '0 20px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)'; }} onMouseOut={(e) => { e.currentTarget.style.transform = 'translateY(0)'; e.currentTarget.style.boxShadow = 'none'; }} > {tier.popular && (
MOST POPULAR
)}
{tier.badge}

{tier.name}

${price}
per {billingCycle === 'monthly' ? 'month' : 'month, billed annually'}
{billingCycle === 'annual' && tier.price.annual > 0 && (
Save ${(tier.price.monthly - tier.price.annual) * 12}/year
)}
{tier.clients}
{tier.tagline}

Client Loyalty Built Right In
